cards.name: Double Hit
cards.description:
Dragon deals
8 (11) damage twice.

cards.name: Strike
cards.description: Deal 6 (9) damage.

cards.name: Switching Tactic
cards.description:
(Retain.)
Reverse ragontaer:Aggro.
This turn, ALL enemies lose Strength equal to ragontaer:Aggro difference.

cards.name: Target Defense
cards.description:
The ragontaer:Front gains
5 (8) Block.

cards.name: Hard Skin
cards.description:
Retain.
Dragon gains 12 (16) Block.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Bizarre Tactic
cards.description:
You gain 10 (14) Block.
Whenever Dragon is attacked this turn, deal 5 (8) damage back.

cards.name: Blazing Strike
cards.description:
Dragon deals
15 (20) damage.
Add a Burn into your hand.

cards.name: Break Attack
cards.description:
Deal 6 (8) damage.
Apply 3 (5) Vulnerable.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Build Up
cards.description: Deal 8 (10) damage. Next Attack card deals 4 (6) additional damage.

cards.name: Burning Energy
cards.description:
Gain [E] [E] ( [E]).
Add a Burn into your discard pile.

cards.name: Cleansing Strike
cards.description:
Deal 9 (12) damage.
Exhaust 1 (2) random Status or Curse card (cards) from anywhere.

cards.name: Combo Attack
cards.description:
Deal 5 (7) damage.
Dragon deals 5 (7) damage.
Gain 1 ragontaer:Bonding.

cards.name: Cover
cards.description:
The ragontaer:Rear gains
9 (13) Block.
Draw 2 cards.

cards.name: Feint
cards.description:
Randomly chosen:
You deal 7 (10) damage or Dragon deals 7 (10) damage.

cards.name: Flame Slash
cards.description:
Dragon deals
8 (12) damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Heat Wave
cards.description: Dragon deals 4 damage and apply 1 (2) Weak to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Hide
cards.description:
The ragontaer:Front gains
12 (16) Block.
Next turn, gain [E].

cards.name: Magic Field
cards.description:
ALL creatures gain
9 (12) Block.

cards.name: Master Plan
cards.description:
The ragontaer:Front gains
7 (9) Block.
The ragontaer:Rear gains
9 (12) Block next turn.

cards.name: Punisher
cards.description: Deal 8 (10) damage. If the enemy has Weak, deal 8 (10) damage again.

cards.name: Quick Fly
cards.description:
Innate.
Dragon deals
9 (12) damage.
Draw a card.

cards.name: Threaten
cards.description:
Innate.
Dragon gains 4 (6) Block and apply 1 (2) Weak.

cards.name: Training
cards.description:
You and Dragon gain 1 Strength each.
Gain 1 ragontaer:Bonding.

cards.name: Weaken
cards.description:
Apply 3 (5) Weak.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Adaptation
cards.description:
(Innate.)
Whenever you shuffle your draw pile, put ALL Innate cards into your hand.

cards.name: Astonish
cards.description: The ragontaer:Rear deals damage equal to 2 (3) times the ragontaer:Aggro difference.

cards.name: Balanced Strike
cards.description:
Innate.
Gain 8 (11) Block.
Deal 8 (11) damage.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Blue Scale
cards.description:
Dragon gains 13 Block.
Add a Hard Skin (+) into your hand.

cards.name: Burning Force
cards.description:
Dragon deals
15 (20) damage.
Deals 7 (10) additional damage for every Burn created this combat.

cards.name: Calculated Defense
cards.description: Weakened enemies deal 2 (3) less damage to your team.

cards.name: Conduct
cards.description: If the ragontaer:Aggro difference is 5 or higher, draw 2 (3) cards.

cards.name: Coolant
cards.description:
Scry 5 (7).
Exhaust any Status or Curse cards revealed.

cards.name: Cross Step
cards.description:
(Innate.)
Whenever your team ragontaer:Switch, gain [E].

cards.name: Dark Breath
cards.description: Dragon deals 4 (5) damage twice and apply 1 (2) Vulnerable.

cards.name: Deep Focus
cards.description:
After 2 turns,
You gain 5 (7) Strength.

cards.name: Dissolve
cards.description:
Add 2 Burns
into your hand.
At the end of each turn, Dragon gains
6 (8) Block.

cards.name: Dragon Dance
cards.description:
Dragon gains
4 (6) Strength and
2 Dexterity.

cards.name: Forked Fire
cards.description: Repeat X times: Dragon deals 7 (9) damage to two random enemies.

cards.name: Ghost Skin
cards.description:
Dragon gains
1 Intangible.
Dragon loses 3 (1) Dexterity.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Haste
cards.description:
Play a (all) Power card (cards) from your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Invisible Flame
cards.description: Whenever the ragontaer:Front attacks, deal 3 (5) damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Last Stand
cards.description:
You gain 5 (10) Block.
For this turn, You receive half damage from attacks.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Low Kick
cards.description:
Deal 9 (12) damage.
Draw cards equal to the amount of Weak applied to the enemy.

cards.name: Magician's Mark
cards.description:
Deal 10 (13) damage.
The next 4 (7) times Dragon attacks this enemy, gain 1 ragontaer:Bonding. Exhaust.

cards.name: Maximum Charge
cards.description:
Dragon deals
30 (40) damage.
Dragon gains
2 Vulnerable.

cards.name: Observe
cards.description:
Innate.
Gain [E] for every 6 cards in your draw pile.

cards.name: Overwhelm
cards.description:
Apply 2 Weak.
All enemies lose HP equal to 3 (4) times their Weak.

cards.name: Purifying Flame
cards.description:
Dragon deals
9 (14) damage.
Remove all debuffs from Dragon.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Reckless Flurry
cards.description:
Choose the attacker.
The attacker loses all Block and deals twice that much to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Running Tactic
cards.description:
Draw 3 (4) cards.
You gain 2 ragontaer:Aggro.

cards.name: Shield Drain
cards.description:
Steal all Block from the enemy.
Deal 10 (13) damage.

cards.name: Shift
cards.description:
Retain.
The (Choose) ragontaer (one):~~- Rear -~~ 
 (You or Dragon) gains
7 ragontaer:Aggro.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Sneak Attack
cards.description:
Can only be played if You are the ragontaer:Rear.
Deal 4 (5) damage 4 times.

cards.name: Star Rain
cards.description: Deal 5 (7) damage X+1 times. This attack does not increase ragontaer:Aggro.

cards.name: Tag Team
cards.description:
The ragontaer:Front gains
6 (9) Block.
Gain 1 ragontaer:Bonding.
If your team ragontaer:Switched this turn, all effects are doubled.

cards.name: Taunting Strike
cards.description:
Choose one: Deal 10 (14) damage, or Dragon deals 10 (14) damage.
The attacker ragontaer:Taunts that enemy.

cards.name: Warm-Up
cards.description:
(Innate.)
At the start of your turn, draw 1 additional card.

cards.name: Echo Tactic
cards.description:
Copy a different card from your hand.
Reduce its cost by 1 (2).
Exhaust.

cards.name: Excess Footwork
cards.description: The ragontaer:Rear gains 4 (6) Dexterity.

cards.name: Fiery Synthesis
cards.description:
Dragon deals
6 (9) damage to ALL enemies.
Convert all potions to ragontaer:Blaze_Potions.

cards.name: Gear Up
cards.description:
Add 2 Safety (+) and Hard Skin (+) into your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Harmonize
cards.description:
(Innate.)
Whenever both You and Dragon attack in a single turn, gain 1 ragontaer:Bonding.

cards.name: Head Start
cards.description:
Innate.
Choose one:
Gain [E] [E]  ( [E]) , or
Draw 2 (3) cards.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Inferno
cards.description:
Dragon deals
32 (40) damage to ALL enemies. Shuffle a Burn into your draw pile for each enemy.

cards.name: Light Shield
cards.description:
You gain 14 (18) Block.
Dragon gains 14 (18) Block.
Costs 1 less [E] for each ragontaer:Bonding bonus you received this combat.

cards.name: Multitask
cards.description:
Draw 2 (3) cards whenever you do
2 of these:
Create a Burn, apply Weak, or ragontaer:Switch.

cards.name: Opening Tactic
cards.description:
Innate.
If the enemy has full HP, Gain 1 Dexterity.
Deal 11 (15) damage.

cards.name: Outburst
cards.description: Dragon enters Wrath for 2 turns.

cards.name: Prediction
cards.description:
Choose a card from your draw pile and put it on top.
It costs 0 until played.

cards.name: Repeat Strike
cards.description:
(Innate.)
Dragon deals 12 damage. At the start of each turn, return this from the discard pile to your hand.

cards.name: Resonance Form
cards.description:
~~- Ethereal. -~~
Effects that give only one of your team Strength, Dexterity or Block now affect both.

cards.name: Safeguard
cards.description:
(Innate.)
The ragontaer:Rear no longer loses Block at the start of your turn.

cards.name: Sealed Strike
cards.description:
Deal 10 (12) (14) (16) (18) (20) damage.
Can be Upgraded 5 times. On 5th upgrade, Upgrade ALL cards in your deck.

cards.name: Shadow Image
cards.description: Whenever You or Dragon attacks, the attacker gains 2 (3) Block.

cards.name: Stun Trap
cards.description:
After 2 turns, Stun the enemy and draw 3 cards.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Tri Attack
cards.description:
Choose 3 times:
You deal 6 (9) damage or Dragon deals 6 (9) damage.

relics.name: Pact Stone
relics.description: At the start of each combat, You and Dragon gain 5 Temporary_HP each.

relics.name: Basic Textbook
relics.description: Increase the damage of Strike and Block from Target Defense by 2.
relics.flavorText: Basic skills are the most important things to learn.

relics.name: Ancient Bone
relics.description: At the start of each combat, add a Hard Skin into your hand.

relics.name: Dragon Food
relics.description: At the end of combat, Dragon heals 3 HP.

relics.name: Tactical Note
relics.description: All cards containing "Tactic" have their effects boosted.

relics.name: Binding String
relics.description: At the start of your turn, if You and Dragon have the same ragontaer:Aggro, gain 2 ragontaer:Bonding.
relics.flavorText: The combination of two fighters is better when they are close.

relics.name: Solid Memories
relics.description: At the start of turn 2, Fetch a card from your discard pile. It costs 0 for the turn.
relics.flavorText: The origin form of Liquid Memories.

relics.name: Magic Stone
relics.description:
Replaces Pact Stone. At the start of each combat, You and Dragon heal 7 HP.
During combat, excess amount of healing is converted to Temporary_HP.
relics.flavorText: The Pact Stone absorbed weird magic.

relics.name: The Chair
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. On turn 1, you only draw Innate cards and cards in Bottle relics.
relics.flavorText: This comfortable chair makes you energized, but switching from rest mode becomes harder. Unless you're talented.

relics.name: Mind Bender
relics.description: When you play a card that let you choose the attacker, you may pick any enemy as the attacker.

relics.name: Odd Armor
relics.description:
On odd-numbered turns, Dragon takes 2 less damage from attacks.
On even-numbered turns, You take 2 less damage from attacks.
relics.flavorText: Because it looks odd, people don't want to wear it even though it's powerful.

relics.name: Switch Button
relics.description: Once per combat, right click to activate. You and Dragon swaps ragontaer:Aggro.

keywords.name: Aggro
keywords.description: Whenever You or Dragon attacks, the attacker gains 1 Aggro. The character with higher Aggro becomes the Front, taking all attacks.

keywords.name: Blaze Potion
keywords.description: A potion which deals 40 damage to an enemy.

keywords.name: Bonding
keywords.description:
Whenever your team gains 5 Bonding, choose 1 of 3 random bonuses.
Only works while Dragon is alive.

keywords.name: Front
keywords.description:
The character marked with Front Marker.
All enemies attack the Front.

keywords.name: Rear
keywords.description: The character in your team without the Front Marker.

keywords.name: Switch
keywords.description:
The Front becomes the Rear, and vice versa.
Switch happens when the Aggro of the Rear becomes higher than the Front.

keywords.name: Taunt
keywords.description:
When an enemy is Taunted, it will always attack the Taunter, not the Front.
Taunt lasts for 1 turn.

mods.name: The Dragon Tamer
mods.credits:
Rita-B - ZHS translation
Rucodeby - RUS translation
HuginRonin - SPA translation
mods.description:
Adds a character called The Dragon Tamer, who fights together with his faithful dragon.

- Adds 75 cards and 12 relics.


v1.2.1 (2022-10-22)

- New Localization: Spanish (Thanks to HuginRonin)
- BUGFIX (cross-mod): Now the dragon gains the correct amount of Block if you have Stiletto relic from Reliquaury mod.
- Removed the yellow text from Multitask power tooltip for clarity. Accomplished tasks are now in purple (instead of yellow).


v1.2.2 (2023-02-10)

- BUGFIX (cross-mod): Fixed crash with Lazy Man's Kits.



For older patch notes, see: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/changelog/2301555870
